> Um, except for the bug (I'm assuming it's a bug, at
 least) which causes a faerie to be able to stun a
 high-level character infinitely with a single hit, it
 seems as if I can always get out of a faerie stunning
 me.

The problem is recovering from the first hit takes a long time.  
Meanwhile, I got hit a second time.  Once I'm hit the second time 
while being frozen from the first hit, I might as well be down for the 
count.  Basically, any exp level 1 faerie becomes a high level threat 
to any mages/archmages on my team.  So that translates to saying any 
druid capable of summoning faeries is a high level threat. (For real 
fun, go through my Weakest Link II from dph's scenarios with a high 
level mage; you better hit the ground running if you don't want to get 
frozen by a faerie.)

[Side note: I really like being able to point to a specific 
scenario(s) to illustrate a point.]
